Title: CodeSHARPer
Description: CodeSHARPer.net is a C# code editor written in C# and WPF, it uses AvalonEdit as code editor, AvalonDock as layout system and NRefactory for code completion.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

CodeSHARPer is a C# code editor written in C# and WPF.

It uses AvalonEdit as code editor and AvalonDock as layout system. The code completion is provided by NRefactory 5.

To try this project you can download the first beta binaries here.

This project aim to be a code editor for several languages, like C#, VB, SQL and others.

 

This project is currently in Beta stage.
